attributes.action: Allow women to carry pepper sprays solely for self defence.
attributes.additional_details:
There is an extensive history of perpetrators not being convicted, sadly because of this women now have a lack of faith in authorities and are left having to protect themselves.

The use of pepper spray is the best self-defence method because it is the least invasive due to its mild discomfort. When it comes into contact with a person’s eyes, it causes eye closure, runny nose, coughing and temporary blindness which can allow the target to getaway.
attributes.background:
We are witnessing a rise in crime, especially against women. 
In 2019 The Home Office published a refresh to its 2016 Violence Against Women and Girls Strategy which states that In the UK, 1 in 4 women will experience domestic abuse and 1 in 5 sexual assault during her lifetime.
